name: Assasin Top Down
description:
Assassin Top Down is an exciting game that puts you in the shoes of a skilled assassin on a mission to eliminate guards without being detected.

As the player, you must carefully plan and execute your attacks, using stealth and strategy to avoid detection.The game is set in a top-down view, giving you a bird's-eye view of the game world. Your mission is to sneak up on guards from behind and take them out without alerting their allies. You must move swiftly and quietly, using the environment to your advantage to stay hidden and avoid detection.

Assassin Top Down is a game that requires careful planning, quick reflexes, and strategic thinking. It offers a unique experience for fans of stealth and action games, with challenging gameplay and thrilling combat. So, put on your assassin's hood, grab your weapons, and get ready to take on the guards in this intense and exciting game.

Game features :
- Upgrading the player
- Multiple levels
- Top-down view
